turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Michelle, I need you to order Starbucks for me please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, not a problem ma'am. Which Starbucks would you prefer me to pick up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Clinic Dr in Hopkinsville, before the super Walmart.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, not a problem. I'm ready for your order when you are.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced white chocolate mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a grande. That should be enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, and whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like it to be made with 2% milk or something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, yes, almond milk. I almost forgot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem, I remembered from last time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all Mrs. Marshall.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know my account information already. Just be sure they get my rewards number too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you again.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I've got the order in and I am headed there now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. Ring me when you're here.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll let you know!
